com.dkc.model

Interface IMoving


  • public interface IMoving
    An object should implement IMoving if it moves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getXDir()
      Returns the change in X per frame.
      double getYDir()
      Returns the change in Y per frame.
      void move()
      Should usually be x += xDir, y -+= yDir, y is minus because position is drawn from top to bottom.
      void setDir(double newXDir, double newYDir)
      Sets the direction the object is moving.

    • Method Detail

      • setDir

        void setDir(double newXDir,
            double newYDir)
        Sets the direction the object is moving.
        Parameters:
        newXDir - The new change in X per frame.
        newYDir - The new change in Y per frame.

      • getXDir

        double getXDir()
        Returns the change in X per frame.
        Returns:
        The change in X per frame.

      • getYDir

        double getYDir()
        Returns the change in Y per frame.
        Returns:
        The change in Y per frame.

      • move

        void move()
        Should usually be x += xDir, y -+= yDir, y is minus because position is drawn from top to bottom.
